input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter to use to handle the request.
Default value: BCANActor

Sample items xml for Overwrite Firewall Rules operation, Values take the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> <container-name>LargeGoldContainer1</container-name> <fw-acl-selector-d-t-o> <vfw-name>VFW</vfw-name> <interface-name>inside</interface-name> <zone-name></zone-name> </fw-acl-selector-d-t-o> <context-host-address>20.20.20.20</context-host-address> <rules> <rule-d-t-os> <element> <description>a</description> <destination-host-address>1.1.1.1</destination-host-address> <destination-network-address>1.1.1.1</destination-network-address> <destination-network-mask>255.255.255.255</destination-network-mask> <destination-port>1126</destination-port> <enabled-flag>true</enabled-flag> <permit-flag>true</permit-flag> <source-host-address>1.1.1.1</source-host-address> <source-network-address>1.1.2.3</source-network-address> <source-network-mask>255.255.255.254</source-network-mask> <transport-protocol>1</transport-protocol> </element> <element> <description>b</description> <destination-host-address>1.1.1.5</destination-host-address> <destination-network-address>1.1.1.6</destination-network-address> <destination-network-mask>255.255.255.252</destination-network-mask> <destination-port>2256</destination-port> <enabled-flag>false</enabled-flag> <permit-flag>false</permit-flag> <source-host-address>1.1.1.89</source-host-address> <source-network-address>1.1.5.9</source-network-address> <source-network-mask>255.255.255.248</source-network-mask> <transport-protocol>2</transport-protocol> </element> </rule-d-t-os> <vfw-last-updated-token>7614688202337989470</vfw-last-updated-token> </rules> </parameters> </item> </items>

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> <soap-version></soap-version> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Creates and executes a Job to overwrite all rules in the specified firewall. If the 'context-host-address' element is not specified, then all existing rules will be replaced.
